Articles.Content:
So I had a contract to put a class E asteroid into Jools Orbit 

I've arrived at the asteroid and docked my vessel to it and i had to find out that i have a DeltaV of 26 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) ,but i throttled up and the asteroid overheats immediately and exploded 

I thought that the engines were far enough away from the asteroid to take me forward, but i havent aspect that it would explode due to overheating

Does anyone else had a situation like this?

![JpEMT4b.png](http://i.imgur.com/JpEMT4b.png)
I had this happen in sandbox. Figured it was a bug. Using time acceleration throws your ship from the asteroid also. Many bugs with the asteroids right now.
Yeah time acceleration in the near of an asteroid teleports the asteroid a bit

LOL

I guess SQUAD forgot to give asteroids an absurd heat tolerance.
